alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 30 at 1:50AM CST until November 30 at 2:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN TALLADEGA AND CENTRAL CALHOUN COUNTIES... At 150 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jacksonville State University to near Grant Town to near Talladega, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Anniston, Oxford, Talladega, Jacksonville, Cobb Town, West End-Cobb Town, Fort McClellan, Saks, Weaver, Munford, Hobson City, Waldo, Anniston Regional Airport, Blue Mountain, Alexandria, Jacksonville State University, Grant Town, Oxford Lake, Bynum and Choccolocco. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
